about_the_game:
In this brief demo you can explore some rooms of the Temple of Mu, tinker with the thousand-years-old mechanisms (but strangely advanced).

There is no clear goal to achieve in this demo other than getting curious minds to explore, fly around using the scarab amulet and understanding the inner workings of the advanced primitive technology of Mu.
detailed_description:
In this brief demo you can explore some rooms of the Temple of Mu, tinker with the thousand-years-old mechanisms (but strangely advanced).

There is no clear goal to achieve in this demo other than getting curious minds to explore, fly around using the scarab amulet and understanding the inner workings of the advanced primitive technology of Mu.
name: Escape from Mu Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: AMD FX-6100/Intel i3-3220 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7750, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 1700/Intel i7-6700K or Equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX Vega 56, Nvidia GTX 1070/GTX1660Ti or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Explore a brief section of the Temple of Mu. Experiment with mechanisms and avoid traps. Fly using the scarab amulet to get a taste of an unobtainable freedom.
